product_name: Timex Expedition Chrono Alarm Timer Digital Watch - Men's
long_description: The rugged, water-resistant Expedition watch packs an arsenal of stat-tracking features, such as a 100-hour chronograph with lap and split times, into a lightweight accessory for hikes and trail runs.
short_description: The rugged, water-resistant Expedition watch packs an arsenal of stat-tracking features, such as a 100-hour chronograph with lap and split times, into a lightweight accessory for hikes and trail runs.
